info.brief_description: Someone at the beach has grown or shrunk!
info.description:
The beach is crowded with people. Someone is about to stand out in the crowd, or disappear entirely! What happens when someone on the beach suddenly grows or shrinks? Its up to you to decide!


There are no rules here, let you fantasies run free. Just note that I reserve the right to delete any chapter.

100 gift points per good addition.
